categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Tam Blackstar was an Imperial TIE Hunter pilot who led Dark Blade Squadron during the Galactic Civil War. He amassed an impressive kill streak against Rebel Alliance pilots and was known for his insane maneuvers. His squadron participated in the attack on the Rebel base on Arda I in 0 ABY during which he pursued a fleeing RZ-1 A-wing interceptor through the narrow canyon known as the Gauntlet.
Tam Blackstar is one of the enemy characters in Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 adventure book Onslaught at Arda I.
